aka: When Evening Falls on Bucharest or Metabolism

cast.name: 亚历山德鲁·帕帕多波尔 Alexandru Papadopol
博格丹·杜米特拉克 Bogdan Dumitrache
米哈拉·斯尔布 Mihaela Sirbu

director.name: 柯内流·波蓝波宇 Corneliu Porumboiu

this_title: Când se lasa seara peste Bucuresti sau metabolism
trans_title: 夜幕降临布加勒斯特，或新陈代谢
When Evening Falls on Bucharest or Metabolism
introduction: Focused on a director and his leading actress while they are off the set. They discuss the discrepancies between film and digital cinema, Western and Eastern food, and try to capture an unfiltered (and seemingly impossible) sense of "reality" on film.
chinese_title: 夜幕降临布加勒斯特，或新陈代谢
foreign_title: Când se lasa seara peste Bucuresti sau metabolism
